config.content:
[core]
	repositoryformatversion = 0
	filemode = false
	bare = true
	symlinks = false
	ignorecase = true
[remote "foo"]
	url = git@github.com:foo/foo.git
	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/foo/*
[remote "bar"]
	url = git@github.com:bar/bar.git
	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/bar/*
